overview:
I am a User Interface Engineer, born in Karachi. 9 years experience in the UI and Web design industry currently working in Tradekey a large B2b portal in world last 2.5 years as senior UI Engineer.

Experience with web 2.0, design patterns, rich internet applications and delivery methodologies. Creating storyboards, mockups and prototypes to effectively communicate interaction, design ideas, and UX deliverables, Defining user model and user interface for different sites.
